data.name: EVE: Valkyrie Warlord’s Vault
data.detailed_description:
30,500 EVE:Valkyrie Gold

Spend this currency to customize your experience with premium ship decals, skins and cockpit interiors.

Gold can also be used to maximize your progression via a range of Implants that increase the XP you earn from every battle.
data.about_the_game:
30,500 EVE:Valkyrie Gold

Spend this currency to customize your experience with premium ship decals, skins and cockpit interiors.

Gold can also be used to maximize your progression via a range of Implants that increase the XP you earn from every battle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 390 equivalent or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: HDMI 1.3 video output supporting a 297MHz clock via a direct output architecture
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel i7 processor
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: HDMI 1.3 video output supporting a 297MHz clock via a direct output architecture
